Ingredients: Eggs, Onion, Tomato, Spices, Oil, Salt
Instructions: Boil eggs, prepare onion-tomato gravy with spices, and mix eggs into the curry.

Ingredients: Eggs, Onion, Green Chili, Coriander, Salt, Oil
Instructions: Beat eggs with onion, chili, and coriander. Cook on pan till golden.

Ingredients: Chicken, Onion, Tomato, Ginger, Garlic, Garam Masala, Oil
Instructions: Marinate chicken with spices, cook with onion-tomato gravy.
Cook tomato gravy with butter and cream, add paneer cubes.

Ingredients: Rice, Mixed Vegetables, Spices, Saffron, Ghee
Instructions: Cook spiced rice with mixed veggies and saffron for flavor.

Ingredients: Potato, Cauliflower, Onion, Tomato, Spices, Oil
Instructions: Sauté onion and tomato, add potato and cauliflower, cook till soft.
Boil chickpeas, cook with onion-tomato masala and spices.

Ingredients: Mutton, Yogurt, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Kashmiri Chili, Spices
Instructions: Cook mutton in yogurt-based curry with aromatic spices.

Ingredients: Fish, Coconut Milk, Tamarind, Spices, Curry Leaves
Instructions: Cook fish in coconut-tamarind curry with curry leaves.

Ingredients: Rice, Urad Dal, Toor Dal, Tamarind, Onion, Tomato, Mustard Seeds, Curry Leaves
Instructions: Make idlis from fermented batter and serve with spicy sambar.
Prepare fermented batter, spread thin on tawa, and cook till crisp.

Ingredients: Rava, Onion, Mustard Seeds, Curry Leaves, Green Chili, Water, Salt, Oil
Instructions: Roast rava, sauté onion and spices, add water, cook till thick.

Ingredients: Flattened Rice, Onion, Potato, Curry Leaves, Mustard Seeds, Turmeric
Instructions: Soak poha, mix with sautéed onion, potato, and spices.
Cook rice with mixed veggies and whole spices.

Ingredients: Kidney Beans, Onion, Tomato, Ginger, Garlic, Spices, Oil
Instructions: Boil kidney beans and cook in spiced onion-tomato gravy.

Ingredients: Toor Dal, Onion, Tomato, Garlic, Mustard Seeds, Ghee, Spices
Instructions: Cook dal, temper with fried garlic and mustard seeds in ghee.

Ingredients: Toor Dal, Tamarind, Vegetables, Mustard Seeds, Curry Leaves
Instructions: Boil dal with tamarind and vegetables, add tempering of mustard seeds.

Ingredients: Spinach, Paneer, Onion, Tomato, Cream, Spices
Instructions: Cook spinach puree with spices and paneer, finish with cream.
Cook chicken in rich tomato-butter gravy with cream.
Stir-fry paneer and capsicum in spicy tomato gravy.

Ingredients: Potato, Tomato, Peas, Onion, Capsicum, Butter, Pav, Spices
Instructions: Mash boiled veggies, cook with masala, serve with buttered pav.

Ingredients: Puffed Rice, Onion, Tomato, Tamarind Chutney, Sev
Instructions: Mix puffed rice with veggies and chutney for a tangy snack.

Ingredients: Potato, Gram Flour, Bread, Garlic, Green Chili, Spices
Instructions: Make potato vada, place in pav with chutneys.

Ingredients: Rice, Milk, Sugar, Cardamom, Dry Fruits
Instructions: Boil rice in milk, add sugar and cardamom, garnish with dry fruits.
Fry khoya balls, soak in sugar syrup.

Ingredients: Gram Flour, Yogurt, Turmeric, Mustard Seeds, Curry Leaves
Instructions: Steam fermented batter, add tempering, and serve soft dhokla.

Ingredients: Semolina, Potato, Chickpeas, Spicy Water, Tamarind Chutney
Instructions: Fill puris with potato and chickpeas, pour spiced tangy water.
Cook okra with onion and tomato masala.

Ingredients: Boiled Eggs, Rice, Spices, Fried Onion, Ghee
Instructions: Layer boiled eggs and rice with masala, cook on dum.
Cook peas and paneer in onion-tomato curry.
